name: ai-coding-agent-protocol
description: AI Coding Agent Protocol marketplace — orchestrated AI development workflows

plugins.name: godmode
plugins.description: GODMODE v5.12.0-experimental — 7 workflow commands, 27 skill packages, 22 agents (15 review + 4 research + 3 team roles), three-tier model assignment (Haiku/Sonnet/Opus), Agent Teams with defined implementation team roles and autodetection routing, autonomous development loops, per-project review configuration, document quality review, knowledge compounding, fresh-eyes review token optimization (LOC gate, agents read diff from file, compact output, tightened triggers), smart review mode, modular CLAUDE.md with @imports, hook-based protocol enforcement, compact review output, review report persistence.
